title: Sunrisers Hyderabad v Gujarat Titans - 19th Match
story_summary: Gujarat Titans won by 7 wickets.
SRH scored 152/8 in 20 overs.
GT chased the target, scoring 153/3 in 16.4 overs.
Mohammed Siraj was named Player of the Match.
Shubman Gill scored a fifty for GT.
Washington Sundar scored 49 runs for GT.

title: Rajasthan Royals v Punjab Kings - 18th Match
story_summary: Rajasthan Royals won by 50 runs.
RR scored 205/4 in 20 overs.
PBKS were restricted to 155/9 in 20 overs.
Jofra Archer was the Player of the Match.
Sanju Samson praised Archer and Sandeep.
RR captain, Sanju Samson scored 32 from 20 balls.

title: Delhi Capitals v Chennai Super Kings - 17th Match
story_summary: Delhi Capitals won by 25 runs.
DC scored 183/6 in 20 overs.
CSK managed 158/5 in 20 overs.
KL Rahul was named Player of the Match.
Vijay Shankar remained not out on 69 for CSK.
MS Dhoni scored an unbeaten 30 off 36 deliveries for CSK.

title: New Zealand v Pakistan - 3rd ODI
story_summary: New Zealand won by 43 runs (42 Ovs game).
NZ scored 264/8 in 42 overs.
Pakistan were all out for 221 in 40 overs.
Michael Bracewell was the Player of the Match.
Ben Sears was the Player of the Series.
Rhys Mariu and Michael Bracewell hit fifties for NZ.
Ben Sears took a fifer in the match.

title: Kent v Northamptonshire - 1st Match
story_summary: Kent won by 145 runs.
Kent scored 231 in the first innings and 171 in the second.
Northamptonshire scored 143 in the first innings and 114 in the second.
